name: Spy Tradecraft
description: Core espionage skills including deception, disguise, and clandestine communication.

cards.title: Legend Building
cards.description: Creating and maintaining false identities for deep cover operations.
cards.summaryText: Build a resilient cover identity by scripting deep backstories, memorizing forged credentials, and rehearsing consistent mannerisms so every interaction reinforces your legend under hostile scrutiny and withstands background probing.

cards.title: Dead Drops & Secure Communications
cards.description: Using hidden drop locations for safe, anonymous intelligence exchange.
cards.summaryText: Master dead drop exchanges by choosing inconspicuous locations, pairing them with one-time retrieval codes, and choreographing low-visibility arrival windows so intelligence moves without exposing assets.
